mapper.select: SELECT id, title, `desc`, image, is_available AS isAvailable FROM activity_simplify WHERE id=#{id} AND is_available=1

SELECT id, simplify_activity_id AS activityId, title, `desc`, product_id AS productId, image FROM activity_simplify_product WHERE simplify_activity_id = #{activityId} AND is_display = 1 ORDER BY sequence DESC, id DESC

SELECT id, `name`, start_time AS startTime, end_time AS endTime, limit_times AS limitTimes, share_increase_times AS shareIncreaseTimes, is_available AS isAvailable, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime FROM activity_crazy_food WHERE is_available=1 AND id=#{activityId}

SELECT activity_id AS activityId, username, left_times AS leftTimes, used_times AS usedTimes, is_wine AS isWine, is_shared AS isShared FROM activity_crazy_food_record WHERE activity_id=#{activityId} AND username=#{username}

SELECT id, activity_id AS activityId, type, coupon_id AS couponId, prize_amount AS prizeAmount, probability, valid_days_type AS validDaysType, days FROM activity_crazy_food_prize WHERE activity_id=#{activityId} AND is_available=1 FOR UPDATE
mapper.update: UPDATE activity_crazy_food_prize SET prize_amount=prize_amount-1 WHERE id=#{id} AND prize_amount=#{prizeAmount} AND prize_amount>0
mapper.select: SELECT mobile_number AS mobileNumber, username , user_image AS userImage, weixin_openid AS weixinOpenid, coupon_id AS couponId, reduce , create_time as createTime FROM red_packet_draw_record WHERE 1=1 AND share_account_id=#{shareAccountId} AND weixin_openid=#{weixinOpenid} AND mobile_number=#{mobileNumber} ORDER BY create_time, id LIMIT #{start},#{max}
SELECT share_account_id AS shareAccountId, is_receive_coupon AS isReceiveCoupon FROM red_packet_share_record WHERE share_account_id=#{shareAccountId}
SELECT id FROM register_mobile_coupon WHERE mobile_number=#{mobileNumber} AND coupon_id=#{couponId} AND source_type=#{sourceType}

SELECT id, activity_id AS activityId, username, left_times AS leftTimes, used_times AS usedTimes, is_wine AS isWine, is_shared AS isShared, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime FROM activity_crazy_food_record WHERE activity_id=#{activityId} AND username=#{username}
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM `order` WHERE account_id=#{accountId} AND pay_time>=#{payTime} AND `status` in(2,3,4)
